content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f302 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e encore worsted slouchy hat size 1 size fits most adults materials 1 ball of encore worsted- color 7172 needles 16 circular size 5 & 7 plus double points- size 7 gauge 5 sts =1 over st st on size 7 needles with smaller needles loosely cast on 100 sts join making sure not to twist the sts place marker work in k1/p1 ribbing for 2 increasing evenly around row to 120 sts on the last round change to larger needle and work in st st until total length is 8 begin decreases change to double points when needed round 1 * k10 k2tog repeat from * around 110 sts round 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 knit even round 3 * k9 k2tog repeat from * around 100 sts round 5 * k8 k2tog repeat from * around 90 sts round 7 * k7 k2tog repeat from * around 80 sts round 8 knit even round 9 * k6 k2tog repeat from * around 70 sts round 11 * k5 k2tog repeat from * around 60 sts round 13 * k4 k2tog repeat from * around 50 sts round 15 * k3 k2tog repeat from * around 40 sts round 16 * k2 k2tog repeat from * around 30 sts round 17 * k1 k2tog repeat from * around 20 sts round 18 * k2tog repeat from * around 10 sts round 19 * k2tog repeat from * around 5 sts cut yarn and thread through remaining sts pull up tight and fasten weave in all ends ©2009 plymouth yarn company all rights reserved 102910jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side yo = yarn over k2tog = knit 2 sts together psso = pass the slipped st over
